Title: Drip, Drip
Writer: Ray McKinnon (creator), Ray McKinnon, Graham Gordy (staff writer), Michael D. Fuller (staff writer)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: It's the sixth day since Daniel's release. At 3 AM, he goes for a walk and hitches a ride with a quirky man who asks Daniel to help him pick up and deliver some goats. Is the man real? Ted ...
